name: The Ultimate Shallow Hal Quiz |   Movies

questions.text: What was the name of the character played by Jason Alexander?
questions.explanation:
Mauricio.

	Jason Alexander is best known for his work on "Seinfeld" playing George Costanza.

questions.text: What is the name of the company that Hal works for?
questions.explanation:
JPS Funds.

	Hal works in the investment banking business.

questions.text: When Hal and Rosemary first meet and have lunch together, what do they order?
questions.correct: a double pizza burger, chili cheese fries, and a large chocolate shake
options: a double pizza burger, chili cheese fries and a large vanilla coke
a double pizza burger, tater tots, and a large vanilla shake
a double pizza burger, chili cheese fries, and a strawberry shake
questions.explanation:
a double pizza burger, chili cheese fries, and a large chocolate shake.

	He was impressed with her because she ordered a real meal.

Shanahan.

	Her father was Steve Shanahan, Hal's boss, of JPS Funds.

questions.text: What is the name of Hal's neighbor whom he had one date with?
questions.explanation:
Jill.

	She became more interested in him when she saw him going out with heavier and unnattractive women because she thought he wasn't shallow after all.

questions.text: What was the name of Rosemary's ex-boyfriend?
questions.explanation:
Ralph.

	Ralph and Rosemary were in the Peace Corps together.

questions.text: Lindy was the name of the girl that Mauricio didn't want to go out with because her second toe was longer than her first toe.
questions.explanation:
True.

	She was a nice looking girl and Mauricio shouldn't have been so picky.

questions.text: After Hal and Rosemary's first official date, what was Rosemary eating while they walked along the sidewalk to Hal's apartment?
questions.explanation:
Caramel apple.

	She was eating the caramel apple on a stick.

questions.text: What was the name of the girl that Hal shared a taxi with following his time in the elevator with Tony Robbins?
questions.explanation:
Katrina.

	She was his first look at inner beauty.  He saw the real her again after Mauricio de-hypnotized him with the phrase Shallow Hal wants a gal.

questions.text: Jack Black portrayed the character of Hal Larson.
questions.explanation:
True.

	He can also be seen in "Saving Silverman" and "High Fidelity".
